headline.main: POST-WAR BRITAIN IS SEEN EMERGING; Charles Morgan, Author, Says Sacrifice by Every Person Foreshadows Future FINDS DEMOCRACY READY It Will Adapt Itself to 'the Requirements of Humanity,' Novelist Declares

lead_paragraph: The stringent wartime economy that forces on every Briton his share of sacrifice forms a rough pattern on which the post-war British economic future may be cut, Charles Morgan, British author, declared here yesterday in an interview.
snippet: The stringent wartime economy that forces on every Briton his share of sacrifice forms a rough pattern on which the post-war British economic future may be cut, Charles Morgan, British author, declared here yesterday in an interview....
